data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Victoriopisa Karaman & Barnard, 1979 (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Eriopisidae) from China, with a key to the genus Victoriopisa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Shuangyan, Liu, Cunqi, Hou, Zhonge (2016): Description of a new species of Victoriopisa Karaman & Barnard, 1979 (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Eriopisidae) from China, with a key to the genus Victoriopisa. Zootaxa 4097 (2): 231-243, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4097.2.5
